title: John Major – 2022 Statement Following the Death of HM Queen Elizabeth II
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Sir John Major, the Prime Minister between 1990 and 1997, on 8 September 2022.
content:
For 70 years Her Majesty The Queen devoted her life to the service of our nation and its wellbeing.
